verses.roman:
vasanta-rajanīte puṣpodyāne viharaṇa
kṛṣṇera saurabhya-ślokera artha-vivaraṇa

synonyms: vasanta-rajanīte—on a spring night; puṣpa-udyāne—in a flower garden; viharaṇa—the wandering; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; saurabhya-ślokera—of a verse about the bodily fragrance; artha-vivaraṇa—describing the meaning.
translation: That chapter also describes Kṛṣṇa's wandering in a garden on a spring night, and it fully describes the meaning of a verse about the scent of Kṛṣṇa's body.
